info.description: IAM Platform API for EduGo - authentication, roles, permissions, resources, menu and screen configuration
info.title: EduGo API IAM Platform

get.description: Return all school contexts the authenticated user has access to

post.description: Authenticate a user and return access/refresh tokens
Use a refresh token to get new access/refresh tokens
Switch the user's active school context and get new tokens
Validate a JWT token and return its claims

get.description: Check the health status of the IAM Platform service
Get the navigation menu filtered by the authenticated user's permissions
Get the complete navigation menu tree without permission filtering
Get a single permission by its ID
Get a single resource by its ID
Get all roles, optionally filtered by scope
Get a single role by its ID
Get all permissions assigned to a role
Get all screen instances with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new screen configuration instance

get.description: Get a screen instance by its unique key
Get a screen instance by its ID

delete.description: Delete a screen instance by its ID

get.description: Resolve and return the combined screen configuration for a given key

post.description: Create a link between a screen instance and a resource

delete.description: Remove the link between a screen instance and a resource

get.description: Get all screen instances linked to a resource
Get all screen templates with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new screen configuration template

get.description: Get a screen template by its ID

delete.description: Delete a screen template by its ID

get.description: Get all roles assigned to a user

post.description: Assign a role to a user

delete.description: Remove a role assignment from a user

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and the JWT token. Example: "Bearer eyJhbGci..."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
